title: "EDA for 9400 Senior Executives"
output: html_notebook

### By Jack Wilburn

### Libraries

```{r, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(readr)
library(mosaic)
library(GGally)
```


### Importing and Cleaning Data

```{r, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
execs = read_csv("~/Programming/Rstudio/3rdYear(370)/CliffHurst/SeniorExecs.csv")
execs = execs[,c(1,2,4:37,44:54)]
```


### EDA

```{r}
#str(execs)
ggplot(data = execs, aes(Rho1)) + geom_histogram()
ggplot(data = execs, aes(Rho1, Rho2)) + geom_point(alpha = 0.5)
pairs = ggpairs(3:19, data = execs)
print(pairs, progress = FALSE)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = execs, aes(GlobalI1, DIMI1)) + geom_point() + geom_smooth(method = lm)
```

```{r, fig.width=10, fig.height=20}
execsmelt = melt(execs)
ggplot(execsmelt,aes(x = value)) + 
    facet_wrap(~variable,scales = "free", ncol = 4) + 
    geom_density(fill = "blue", alpha = 0.5)
```
